title: Law rune

properties.name: description
properties.value: The law rune is a rune used in all teleportation spells, including Telekinetic Grab. For non-members, the main source of law runes is from monster drops, as most monsters that drop runes may occasionally drop law runes. For members, they may be purchased in the Mage Arena or in the Wizards' Guild, requiring 66 Magic and completion of The Hand in the Sand. They can also be purchased from Ali Morrisane after partial completion of the Rogue Trader miniquest (after completing The Feud quest), and from the magic store on Ape Atoll after obtaining the greegree as part of the Monkey Madness I quest.

Item ID563

The law rune is a rune used in all teleportation spells, including Telekinetic Grab. For non-members, the main source of law runes is from monster drops, as most monsters that drop runes may occasionally drop law runes. For members, they may be purchased in the Mage Arena or in the Wizards' Guild, requiring 66 Magic and completion of The Hand in the Sand. They can also be purchased from Ali Morrisane after partial completion of the Rogue Trader miniquest (after completing The Feud quest), and from the magic store on Ape Atoll after obtaining the greegree as part of the Monkey Madness I quest.

Contents

  • 5 Changes
    • 5.1 Gallery (historical)

Runecraft info[edit | edit source]

Law runes may be crafted using the by members with at least 54 Runecraft and completion of Troll Stronghold (to obtain the law talisman). Players with at least 95 Runecraft will craft two law runes per essence.

The Law Altar is located on Entrana, in the northeastern part of the island. Alternatively, the Abyss can be used to get to the Law Altar.

  1. â†‘ Accessible only in the Guardians of the Rift minigame.

Balloon transport system[edit | edit source]

The most common method to craft law runes is via the balloon transport system:

Items required[edit | edit source]

  • Pure essence
  • A law or catalytic tiara
  • Rings of dueling
  • Normal logs
  • Essence pouches
  • Super energy or Stamina potions
  • Raiments of the Eye or Weight-reducing clothing

Preparation[edit | edit source]

Log storage units can be found at every balloon station, and the contents are shared amongst all units. Up to 100 of each log used as payment can be stored, and can be added in noted form.

To avoid needing to carry logs in the inventory on each trip, the log storage units should be filled with as many normal logs as trips will be taken.

The route[edit | edit source]

  1. Add 1 super energy or stamina potion to your inventory. Fill up your essence pouches and the rest of your inventory with essence.
  2. Run from the Castle Wars bank to the hot air balloon just northeast. Pay the monk to have him take you to Entrana.
  3. Run to the Law Altar and craft your essence into law runes.
  4. Teleport via the ring of dueling back to Castle Wars and repeat.

{{External|rs|rsc}} {{HasMMG|Crafting law runes through the Abyss}} {{Infobox Item |name = Law rune |image = [[File:Law rune.png]] |release = [[24 May]] [[2001]] |update = New magic system online! |members = No |quest = No |tradeable = Yes |placeholder = Yes |equipable = No |stackable = Yes |noteable = No |destroy = Drop |examine = Used for teleport spells. |value = 240 |weight = 0.000 |exchange = Yes |id = 563 }} [[File:Law rune detail.png|left|120px]] The '''law rune''' is a [[Runes|rune]] used in all [[Teleportation spells|teleportation]] [[spells]], including [[Telekinetic Grab]]. For [[Free-to-play|non-members]], the main source of law runes is from [[monster]] drops, as most monsters that drop runes may occasionally drop law runes. For [[members]], they may be purchased in the [[Mage Arena]] or in the [[Wizards' Guild]], requiring 66 [[Magic]] and completion of [[The Hand in the Sand]]. They can also be purchased from [[Ali Morrisane]] after partial completion of the [[Rogue Trader]] [[miniquest]] (after completing [[The Feud]] [[quest]]), and from the [[Tutab's Magical Market|magic store]] on [[Ape Atoll]] after obtaining the [[greegree]] as part of the [[Monkey Madness I]] quest. ==Runecraft info== Law runes may be crafted using the by [[members]] with at least {{SCP|Runecraft|54|link=yes}} and completion of [[Troll Stronghold]] (to obtain the [[law talisman]]). Players with at least {{SCP|Runecraft|95|link=yes}} will craft two law runes per essence. The [[Law Altar]] is located on [[Entrana]], in the northeastern part of the island. Alternatively, the [[Abyss]] can be used to get to the Law Altar. {{Tabber |tab1=Pure essence |tab1content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 54 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 9.5 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Law Altar |tools = Law tiara, Law talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 95. |mat1 = Pure essence |output1 = Law rune }} |tab2=Daeyalt essence |tab2content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 54 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 14.25 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Law Altar |tools = Law tiara, Law talisman |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 95. |mat1 = Daeyalt essence |mat1cost = no |output1 = Law rune }} |tab3=Guardian essence |tab3content={{Recipe |skill1 = Runecraft |skill1lvl = 54 |skill1boostable = yes |skill1exp = 10.5 |members = yes |ticks = 1 |facilities = Law Altar |notes = [[Multiple runes|2 runes]] per essence after level 95. |mat1 = Guardian essence |mat1itemnote = Accessible only in the [[Guardians of the Rift]] minigame. |mat1cost = no |output1 = Law rune }} }} ===Balloon transport system=== The most common method to craft law runes is via the [[balloon transport system]]: ====Items required==== * [[Pure essence]] * A [[law tiara|law]] or [[catalytic tiara]] * [[Ring of dueling|Rings of dueling]] * [[Logs|Normal logs]] * [[Essence pouch]]es * [[Super energy]] or [[Stamina potion|Stamina]] potions * [[Raiments of the Eye]] or [[Weight-reducing clothing]] ====Preparation==== Log storage units can be found at every balloon station, and the contents are shared amongst all units. Up to 100 of each log used as payment can be stored, and can be added in noted form. To avoid needing to carry logs in the inventory on each trip, the log storage units should be filled with as many [[Logs|normal logs]] as trips will be taken. ====The route==== # Add 1 [[super energy]] or [[Stamina potion|stamina]] potion to your [[inventory]]. Fill up your [[essence pouch]]es and the rest of your inventory with [[Pure essence|essence]]. # Run from the [[Castle Wars]] [[bank]] to the hot air balloon just northeast. Pay the monk to have him take you to [[Entrana]]. # Run to the [[Law Altar]] and craft your essence into law runes. # Teleport via the [[ring of dueling]] back to Castle Wars and repeat. {{Law Rune Spells}} ==Products== {{Uses material list|Law rune}} ==Item sources== {{Drop sources|Law rune}} ===Store locations=== {{Store locations list|Law rune}} ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 13 June 2005 |update = RuneCraft Update and Tweaks |change = *The item's value was increased from 40 to 240. *The item was graphically updated for a second time. }} {{Subject changes |date = 1 June 2005 |change = The item was graphically updated. }} {{Subject changes footer}} ===Gallery (historical)=== {|style="text-align: center" cellpadding="15" |[[File:Law rune detail (historical v1).png|center|300x150px]] | |[[File:Law rune detail.png|center|300x150px]] |- |[[File:Law rune (historical, v1).png|center]] |[[File:Law rune (historical, v2).png|center]] |[[File:Law rune.png|center]] |- |29 March 2004 â€“
